segments.text: Playing the chess is very exhausting , isn't ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , doing it in the long run will make you an acute man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid playing the chess like that will soon make me an old man . I noticed that most chess players were bald .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's because you are always fixing your eyes on the bald .
segments.speaker: S2
